com.mlt.ml.network

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mlt.ml.network.Node
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Persistent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActivationNode, BiasNode, BranchNode, ConcatNode, Filter1DNode, Filter2DNode, Pool1DNode, Pool2DNode, WeightsNode

    public abstract class Node
extends java.lang.Object
implements Persistent
    A node of a computational graph.

    In the forward pass, a node reads data from the input edges, processes it, and pushes the resulting data to the output edges.

    In the backward pass, a node may read data, normally deltas to adjust parameters, from the output edges, do as internally expected, and optionally push backward data to the input edges.

    Author:
    Miquel Sas
